questions.a: FluxEz is a completely free online text-to-image service based on the Flux.1[schnell] model. Feel free to unleash your creativity here!
Yes, we provide our image generation service completely free of charge.

questions.q: What types of images can FluxEz create?
questions.a: Various styles including realistic scenes, artistic illustrations, anime-style portraits, and more.

questions.q: Can I use FluxEz generated images for commercial purposes?
questions.a: Absolutely! You own the rights to use the generated images for both personal and commercial purposes.
Flux.1[schnell] is one of the most outstanding and advanced models in the text-to-image field, open-sourced by Black Forest Lab.

questions.q: Do I need to create an account and log in to use FluxEz?
questions.a: No, you can use our image generation feature directly.
